name: Westinghouse Electric & Manufacturing Company v. MacGregor, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Westinghouse Electric & Manufacturing Co. v. MacGregor

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
parties: Westinghouse Electric & Manufacturing Company v. MacGregor, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment of the court below in favor of the plaintiff against the defendant in the sum of $15,485.96 is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Soffel, and in accordance with the opinion we heretofore filed in this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Jo. Baily Brown, with him Smith, Buchanan é Ingersoll and Brown, Gritchlow & Flick, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Westinghouse Electric & Manufacturing Company v. MacGregor, Appellant.
Argued May 23, 1945.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
William B. Jaspert, for appellant.
Jo. Baily Brown, with him Smith, Buchanan é Ingersoll and Brown, Gritchlow & Flick, for appellee.
June 29, 1945:
